channel.title: Greetings!
channel.description:
Hello, this is a introductory post [i][Like any of you actually care lol][/i] I'm a lurker. Been stalking the forums for years but never felt the need to post. I know about all the trolls and everything so no need to tell me about how "[i]nice[/i]" these forums. I can handle myself.
Anyways, I'm excited about the mod. I still facepalm about people who say it's dead. I mean, they aren't intelligent enough to see all the updates to the wiki? Fucking sad I say!
More info:
1. I'm not a troll. Never was one. Don't taze me 'bro! 2. I won't be dumb enough to mini-mod. That's Raw Bean and Raminator's job. 3. I have complete faith in the BM team and the mod itself 4. I think Raminator has a pretty nose :3 5. When BM is released I will jizz all over the place

item.title: Greetings!
item.dc:creator: KenCastle
item.description:
Jethrosoup:

All that time lurking and you’re not prepared for the jocular, self-loathing nature of these forums? Good luck kiddo.

Oh, I do plenty of self loathing, trust me :awesome:

Also: INB4LOCK

Read full topic

item.title: Greetings!
item.dc:creator: KenCastle
item.description:
calhoun freeman:

Put this thing in introduction thread.

rubs tired eyes Sorry about that.

Jethrosoup:

Oh hi swampfox

So every new person that joins the forums must be swampfox? :facepalm: Seriously?

SassyRobot:

You sound pretty dumb if you think Raw Bean is active here.

I was merely talking about responsibility and who wields the almighty banhammer…not who is active and who isn’t.

Read full topic

item.title: Greetings!
item.dc:creator: KenCastle
item.description:
Hello, this is a introductory post [Like any of you actually care lol] I’m a lurker. Been stalking the forums for years but never felt the need to post. I know about all the trolls and everything so no need to tell me about how “nice” these forums. I can handle myself.

Anyways, I’m excited about the mod. I still facepalm about people who say it’s dead. I mean, they aren’t intelligent enough to see all the updates to the wiki? Fucking sad I say!

More info:

  1. I’m not a troll. Never was one. Don’t taze me 'bro!
  2. I won’t be dumb enough to mini-mod. That’s Raw Bean and Raminator’s job.
  3. I have complete faith in the BM team and the mod itself
  4. I think Raminator has a pretty nose :3
  5. When BM is released I will jizz all over the place
